participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative, sociable, and nurturing. Emily has a warm and engaging presence that makes people feel comfortable.
participant_1.background: I have two things I love: cookies and my long curly hair. I've been with my husband for 5 years and we love to cosplay together. I'm from the Midwest, where I learned to love the arts and crafts. I care about the way I look when I am in public. I enjoy trying new ethnic foods with my friends from out of town.

participant_2.name: Alex
participant_2.personality: Independent, introspective, and practical. Alex tends to focus on his passions and values a strong work-life balance.
participant_2.background: My social media presence is part of my job, so I try to keep it up-to-date and interesting. I enjoy my family and do not care about socializing. Last month the farm was foreclosed so I'm looking for a new job. I'm moving to a new city to be closer to my favorite antique stores and 80s music venues. I like to bake brownies.

content.text: Hi! I'm participant_1, what's yours?
Hey, I'm participant_2! How are you doing today?
I'm doing great, thanks! How about you?
I'm doing alright. I'm just a little tired, but I'm excited to move to my new city!
That's exciting! Where are you moving to?
I'm moving to [city name]! I'm really excited to be closer to my favorite antique stores and 80s music venues.
That sounds like a great place to live! I'm sure you'll love it there.
Thanks! I'm hoping so too.
What do you do for work?
I'm a social media manager for a small business.
Oh, that sounds like a fun job! Do you like it?
I do! It's a lot of work, but it's also really rewarding.
That's great! What are your hobbies?
I love to bake, read, and spend time with my family.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love to bake too. What's your favorite thing to bake?
I love to bake brownies! They're so easy and delicious.
Brownies are the best! I love them too.
We should bake brownies together sometime!
That would be fun! I'm free this weekend, if you are.
I am! I'll bring the ingredients.
Great! I'll set up the oven
